channel.title: art on breadchris
channel.description: Recent content in art on breadchris

item.title: AI Can't Fold 1000 Cranes
item.description: Folding 1000 origami cranes sounds at lot easier than it is. When my engineer mind latched onto the idea of completing this task, I was intrigued by the foretold wish one would get in exchange for folding a bunch of the easiest origami models. Kids do this every year in Japan, how hard could it be? On average, it would take me 5 minutes to fold a crane from start to finish.

item.title: Information About Gloving
item.description: Since the EmazingLights site seems to be down. I have moved the information over here to keep it alive! Start Gloving Welcome to the Learn Gloving Center, the most extensive online resource out there for learning everything you need to know about gloving. Constantly being updated and contributed to by the worldâ€™s most knowledgeable glovers, this is your first and best resource for learning what you need to jump into the world of gloving.
